text: Bargeddie () is a small town in North Lanarkshire, Scotland, east of the junction of the M73 and M8 motorways, west of Coatbridge town centre. A location in the same area is named in Timothy Pont's map of 1595, but it appears to be originally spelt as Balgedy. ==People== Former Scottish football player and Arsenal manager, George Graham was born at Bargeddie on 30 November 1944. Category:Towns in North Lanarkshire
title: Bargeddie
